frontmatter.title: Github Action to upload SimpleCov Coverage Results
frontmatter.description: I've been playing around with Actions ever since and one of my new projects, a Ruby Gem, didn't have any form of CI as of this morning. I set out to create an Action that would run the tests for the gem and produce coverage results via SimpleCov.

frontmatter.title: Adding a Test Environment to the Active Record Rake Tasks Gem
frontmatter.description: Set up a testing environment that can be run locally and in a repeatable fashion for continuous integration
